item.title: DIY Cross Stitch Stand
item.author: hathoutwillard@domain.com (Simon Hathout Willard)
item.description: For the past few years, I’ve been cross stitching as a way to relax. I like how I can follow a pattern someone else created, listen to some music, and eventually end up with a beautiful piece of art to display. Below are a few of the pieces that I’ve made. Patterns are from DMC, as well as this book. However, I’ve found my hand gets tired after holding the hoop for a long period of time.
